properties.description: There is a toddler's group 'Praise and Play' on Monday afternoons and the Tuesday cafe is listed separately. We cater for those wishing to play the games listed. This is a small leisure centre normally let out to defined groups but now having a Games morning on Fridays. Table tennis, pool and table football are available as well as board games, chess and card games.

properties.description: Launchpad is a social enterprise, training adults with learning disabilities in catering and hospitality. We aim to support our trainees to improve their confidence, motivation and develop social skills to achieve their personal goals to gain employment At Wesley's we run a range of different activities throughout the week. We can also host regular groups to run their own activites. For more information please contact us on 07955 863160 or pop in and speak to a member of staff.
